title: Microphone BOYA BY-M1 with Pixel 4XL
content:
I want to use an external microphone with a Pixel 4XL.

It is a BOYA BY-M1 and I have connected it to the official Google USB-C to 3.5mm adapter (although maybe this is for headphones with a microphone, not only a microphone).

But when I plug in it to the smartphone, I see a notification with this message:
Analog audio accessory detected
The attached device is not compatible with this phone. Tap to learn more.



Can I use this microphone with the Pixel 4XL somehow?

If not, can I use this smartphone with a similar microphone?


Thanks!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
